nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Darth Maul's Mission
LEGO Star Wars: Darth Maul's Mission is a children's book that was released on January 1, 2012. It is the story of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace through Darth Maul's eyes.
Darth Maul gets more than he bargained for when he's sent to capture Padmé Amidala. Two Jedi, one Force-sensitive orphan, and a whole Queen's entourage: so much for a simple kidnapping mission!
